kp2:0.2_0: The tenth training rule on exchanging what is meant.
kp2:1.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from killing living creatures.
kp2:10.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from receiving gold and money.
kp2:11.1_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on tenth rule, is finished.
kp2:2.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from stealing.
kp2:3.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from sexual activity.
kp2:4.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from lying.
kp2:5.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from taking alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
kp2:6.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from food at the wrong time.
kp2:7.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from dancing, singing, music, and seeing shows.
kp2:8.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from beautifying and adorning myself with garlands, perfumes, and makeup.
kp2:9.1_0: I undertake the precept to refrain from high and luxurious beds.
